00080     public static function buildMenuBlock( $sTitle, $arOptions = array() )
00081     {
00082         $_sOut = null;
00083         $_sLink = PS::o( $arOptions, 'link', '#', true );
00084 
00085         //  Make the header
00086         $_sHeader = PS::tag(
00087             PS::o( $arOptions, 'headerTag', 'h3', true ),
00088             PS::o( $arOptions, 'headerOptions', array(), true ),
00089             PS::link( $sTitle, $_sLink )
00090         );
00091 
00092         //  build the links
00093         foreach ( $arOptions as $_sLabel => $_arLink )
00094         {
00095             if ( is_array( $_arLink ) )
00096                 $_sUrl = PS::o( $_arLink, 'url', null, true );
00097             else
00098             {
00099                 $_sUrl = $_arLink;
00100                 $_arLink = array();
00101             }
00102 
00103             $_sOut .= self::getMenuLink( $_sUrl, $_sLabel, self::$m_iHeaderCount, $_arLink );
00104         }
00105 
00106         //  And return...
00107         return PS::tag( 'div', array( 'id' => PS::ID_PREFIX . '_menu' . self::$m_iHeaderCount++ ), $_sHeader . PS::tag( 'ul', array(), $_sOut ) );
00108     }
00109 
00123     public static function buildMenuFromArray( $sIndex, $arMenu = array() )
00124     {
00125         if ( $_arMenuBlock = PS::o( $arMenu, $sIndex ) )
00126         {
00127             $_sTitle = PS::o( $_arMenuBlock, 'title' );
00128             $_sLink = PS::o( $_arMenuBlock, 'link', '#', true );
00129             $_arItems = PS::o( $_arMenuBlock, 'items' );
00130 
00131             $_arItems['link'] = $_sLink;
00132 
00133             //  If a non-array is passed in, assume it's to be eval'd...
00134             if ( ! is_array( $_arItems ) && ! empty( $_arItems ) )
00135                 $_arItems = eval( 'return ' . $_arItems . ';' );
00136 
00137             return self::buildMenuBlock( $_sTitle, $_arItems );
00138         }
00139 
00140         return null;
00141     }
00142 
00151     public static function getMenuLink( $sUrl, $sTitle, $iActive = 0, $arOptions = array() )
00152     {
00153         static $_sCurrent = null;
00154         $_sOut = null;
00155 
00156         $_sClass = PS::o( $arOptions, 'class', null, true );
00157         $_sCurrentClass = PS::o( $arOptions, 'class', self::$m_sCurrentClass, true );
00158 
00159         if ( null === $_sCurrent ) $_sCurrent = Yii::app()->getRequest()->getRequestUri();
00160 
00161         if ( $sUrl == $_sCurrent || false !== stripos( $_sCurrent, $sUrl ) )
00162         {
00163             $_sClass = PS::addClass( $_sClass, self::$m_sCurrentClass );
00164             self::$m_iCurrentSection = $iActive;
00165         }
00166 
00167         $arOptions['class'] = $_sClass;
00168 
00169         return PS::tag( 'li', array(), PS::link( $sTitle, $sUrl, $arOptions ) );
00170     }
